sense.def:
A parade
je sprevod ljudi ali vozil, ki se premikajo skupaj, na primer po mestnih ulicah, v počastitev posebnega dogodka.

seg.quote: When the war was over there was a parade in London.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
parade
, korakajo ali hodijo skupaj v urejeni skupini.

seg.quote: The army paraded round the square.
The captured criminals were paraded in chains through the streets.

sense.def:
Kadar so vojaki
on parade
, ob uradni priložnosti stojijo ali korakajo skupaj.

Kadar človek
parades something
, tisto kaže ljudem, da bi nanje naredil dober vtis.
